name: real-time-portfolio-analytics
description: Real-time risk calculations based off of live market data and your portfolio

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -k -s first -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" -c "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
